content.en: Immunological scheduling: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms inspired by the human immune system to solve complex scheduling problems in various industries. These algorithms, known as artificial immune algorithms, combine the principles of the immune system with other optimization techniques to find optimal solutions. By incorporating features such as clonal selection, hypermutations, and swarm intelligence, these algorithms are able to effectively tackle problems like job shop scheduling, flow shop scheduling, and open shop scheduling.
content.da: Immunologisk planlægning: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer inspireret af det menneskelige immunsystem til at løse komplekse planlægningsproblemer i forskellige industrier. Disse algoritmer, kendt som kunstige immunalgoritmer, kombinerer principper fra immunsystemet med andre optimeringsteknikker for at finde optimale løsninger. Ved at inkorporere funktioner som klonal selektion, hypermutationer og sværmintelligens er disse algoritmer i stand til effektivt at tackle problemer som job shop-planlægning, flow shop-planlægning og open shop-planlægning.
